title: Can't recover my account
body:
Hello,

I have played lol since the release but after a year i've stopped. Now i want to play some more :)
I can't manage to recover my account.
I received a link from riot to change my password and recover my account but it's not looking good.

Please help

replies.body: Hey, don't worry we can help update your info and assist with recovery.  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team will get back to you as soon as they can!
